titleStmt.title: A Catalogue of Latin and English books, both antient and modern; viz. divinity, history, and humanity, travels, voyages, romances, poetry, &c. in all volumes. Which will be sold by auction (or who bids most) at VValsal's Coffee-House in Naggs-Head-Court in Bartholomew-Lane, on the back-side of the Royal-Exchange, on Monday the 12th. day of this instant July 1697. The sale beginning at five of the clock in the afternoon to nine at night; continuing daily till all the books are sold. Catalogues are given gratis, at Thomas Bever, next to Richard's Coffee-house in Fleet-street, at Richard Parkers under the Piazza of the Royal-Exchange. W. Whitowood at the Crown in Little-Britain, Anthony Feltham in Westminster-Hall, booksellers; and at the place of sale.

A Catalogue of Latin and English books, both antient and modern; viz. divinity, history, and humanity, travels, voyages, romances, poetry, &c. in all volumes. Which will be sold by auction (or who bids most) at VValsal's Coffee-House in Naggs-Head-Court in Bartholomew-Lane, on the back-side of the Royal-Exchange, on Monday the 12th. day of this instant July 1697. The sale beginning at five of the clock in the afternoon to nine at night; continuing daily till all the books are sold. Catalogues are given gratis, at Thomas Bever, next to Richard's Coffee-house in Fleet-street, at Richard Parkers under the Piazza of the Royal-Exchange. W. Whitowood at the Crown in Little-Britain, Anthony Feltham in Westminster-Hall, booksellers; and at the place of sale.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
